channel.title: Help NOT SURE IF IS CLIENT OR SERVER
channel.description:
The total level allways show 2475 no matter what level you are... what file do I change it and how? If you leave the mouse at a skill the xp bar shows in wrong places... what file do I change it and how?
Help me with those errors please
